Package business.interfaces

Interface IModule

All Known Implementing Classes:
Module
public interface IModule
Defines the core functionality for Module management within the educational system. This interface establishes the contract for handling module-related operations including:
  • Basic module information access
  • Course association management
  • Data validation
  • JSON data processing
  • Module filtering and search operations

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the module.
      Returns:
      The module name

    • getCode

      java.lang.String getCode()
      Retrieves the unique code identifier of the module.
      Returns:
      The module code

    • getAcYear

      java.lang.String getAcYear()
      Retrieves the academic year of the module.
      Returns:

    • getAssociatedCourses

      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAssociatedCourses()
      Retrieves the list of course codes associated with this module.
      Returns:
      List of associated course codes

    • isAssociatedWithCourse

      boolean isAssociatedWithCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode)
      Checks if the module is associated with a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The course code to check
      Returns:
      true if the module is associated with the course, false otherwise

    • isValid

      boolean isValid()
      Validates the module's data.
      Returns:
      true if the module data is valid, false otherwise

      Returns:

    • getModulesForCourse

      static java.util.List<java.lang.Module> getModulesForCourse​(java.lang.String courseCode) throws java.io.IOException
      Retrieves all modules associated with a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseCode - The course code to filter by
      Returns:
      List of modules associated with the specified course
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error accessing module data

    • searchByName

      static java.util.List<java.lang.Module> searchByName​(java.util.List<java.lang.Module> modules, java.lang.String searchTerm)
      Searches for modules by name.
      Parameters:
      modules - List of modules to search through
      searchTerm - Term to search for in module names (case-insensitive)
      Returns:
      List of modules matching the search term

    • getModuleByCode

      static java.lang.Module getModuleByCode​(java.lang.String code) throws java.io.IOException
      Retrieves a specific module by its code.
      Parameters:
      code - The code of the module to retrieve
      Returns:
      The module with the specified code, or null if not found
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If there is an error accessing module data
